title: AI Coach
start_chatting: Start chatting with your Atomic Habits Coach!

starter.title: Don't know where to start? Try these 3 steps
starter.subtitle: 1. Define who you want to be 2. Pick a 2-minute action 3. Do the smallest step today.
prompts: I'm feeling lost, guide me in 3 simple steps.
Ask me 3 questions to find my first 2-minute habit.
Give me one tiny action I can do right now.
starter.example_placeholder: For example: where should I start?
starter.need_starting_point: Need a starting point? Pick one:

proposal.title: Coach Proposal
proposal.change_details: I'd like to change the details.
proposal.yes_identity: Yes, that's who I want to be!

errors.token: AI service token is invalid on backend. Please configure a valid AGENTSCOPE_MODEL_API_KEY.
errors.backend_error: AG-UI returned an error from backend.

success.starter_added: Added the first tiny habit. Keep it easy.
success.great_choice: Great choice! Focusing on one small step is the key.

weekly.title: Weekly Wins
weekly.subtitle: Focus on the Gain, not the Gap
weekly.default_suggestion: Keep going with small, consistent steps this week.

focus.title: Daily Focus
focus.subtitle: Just one thing. Just 2 minutes.
focus.worry: Don't worry about the rest. Just do this.
focus.success_subtitle: One step closer to your identity.

memory.title: AI Memory Context
memory.subtitle: What your coach remembers about you.
memory.empty_profile: Keep chatting. Your coach will save patterns, preferences, and constraints here.
